title: In Florida, Push for Strict New Gun Ban
text:
Gun-control advocates in Florida are mobilizing behind an ambitious aim: to pass a ban on semiautomatic rifles with high-capacity magazines for the first time in a Republican-controlled state.

Promoting the effort are survivors and relatives of victims of the 2018 school shooting in Parkland, Fla., that killed 17 people and the 2016 Pulse nightclub shooting in Orlando, Fla., that killed 49. A political committee they formed, Ban Assault Weapons Now, is pushing to meet a February deadline to gather enough signatures to put...
description: Gun-control advocates in Florida are mobilizing behind an ambitious aim: to pass a ban on semiautomatic rifles with high-capacity magazines for the first time in a Republican-controlled state.
